author: Michael Anthony Adams, Roberto Daza, Joe Hill, Courtney Brooks
title: South Sudan Just Ended Its Civil War — for Now
description: The news is a glimmer of hope for the traumatized country, but ethnic tension is just under the surface in the nation's second largest city.
content:
MALAKAL, South Sudan Six years of civil war between the forces of President Salva Kiir and those of his former deputy-turned rebel leader Riek Machar ended in February after more than a year of negotiations. 
 The announcement of a new, unified government ha… [+2591 chars]
